thread.title: The Cricket's Daily 3: 'The Martian' invades America
thread.title_full: The Cricket's Daily 3: 'The Martian' invades America | The Salt Lake Tribune

author: Sean P. Means
title: The Cricket's Daily 3: 'The Martian' invades America
text:
Here's what is happening in pop culture:
• Ridley Scott's science-fiction drama "The Martian" took the weekend box-office race, with an estimated $55 million this weekend. [ Box Office Mojo ]
• New Zealand director Taika Waititi ("Flight of the Conchords," "What We Do in the Shadows") is in talks to direct the third "Thor" movie, "Thor: Ragnarok." [ The Hollywood Reporter ]
• Miley Cyrus went on "Saturday Night Live" this weekend and gave an emotional rendition of "The Twinkle Song," which made even her cry. [ The Huffington Post ]
